name: Sticky(stickman active ragdoll game) V1.0
description:
this is a prototype for a rag doll game that i am making inspired by games like human fall flat, gang beasts, and stickfight, the game, and other active ragdoll games

controls:

WASD or right-click to move or drag the rag doll

R to restart

Left click to spawn a box

ESC to enter pause menu

Use pause menu to adjust movement force

quick mention:

I used the c# script on miko-t's github page

https://bit.ly/2tzRG2Y
